Public Relations, Government Relations, Marketing Communications, Web/Social Media Implementation, Writing/Editing, Strategic Planning, Staff Management

Directed public affairs effort for leading statewide private foundation.  Company representative to local and state business, trade, and civic associations.•  Provided public affairs support in building successful statewide initiative to advance the biosciences.  Arizona's Bioscience Roadmap is recognized nationally for fostering consensus around a key economic driver through strategic data collection, analysis, and communication.•  Managed and staffed stakeholder task force to promote bioscience education and workforce initiatives, leading to significant increase in the number of Arizona schools with bioscience programs.•  Assisted in the development of unique web and social media presence for internal use and numerous partner organizations.•  Coordinated delegations of statewide bioscience leaders to Washington, D.C. and assisted in organizing information sessions for Arizona elected officials and candidates for office.

Responsible for corporate communications for the third largest wireless carrier in the U.S.  Initiated a full range of strategic communications endeavors that surveyed highest among employees of all AT&T business units.  Created twice-weekly online newsletter for companys 30,000 employees, increasing overall awareness of key news and information and reducing the number of individual global e-mails.  Redesigned company Intranet site into a more effective and useful communications tool.  Oversaw development of monthly online video segments showcasing major company news and employee initiatives.  Viewership quadrupled over previous method of video distribution.  Coordinated company's quarterly all-employee meetings and all-employee teleconferences, including senior management scripts, presentations, collateral materials, and publicity.  Employee participation rates far exceeded industry averages.

Directed public affairs office for the company's fastest growing market.  Created and disseminated all official communications to the press, government officials, and employees.  Company representative to local and state business, trade, and civic associations.  Orchestrated major media placements and public relations support for new products, services, store openings, and community events.  Organized successful grassroots campaign to win state legislator support of company and industry wireless safety initiative.  Initiated weekly online newsletter for company's 300 employees that served as a model for all company markets.

  Created public affairs office for the company's newest market (Arizona).  Accomplished a full range of public awareness initiatives that successfully raised the profile and leadership position of the company and its executives.  Created and disseminated all official communications to the press, government officials, customers, and employees of Utah's  oldest and largest health maintenance organization.

I've worked for people managers who leverage the talent of their people and manage them and their work.  It was inspiring to work for Jim because he is a creative writer, relationship manager, and innovator of his own. He's the guy you want around -- and not just for the work.
